archimate:WorkPackage.name: (Lng) ICT Disaster recovery
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation: All the actions are needed to realise a full ICT disater recovery capability. 1. The physical (unified) data-center is shifted to a "software defined" data-center hosted by a "public" cloud (or an analogue country-wide trusted hybrid cloud). 2. Disaster recovery procedures are defined, applied and tested on a regular base 3. etc.
